New Records: Steven Kwan extended his Cleveland franchise record by reaching base in a 16th straight postseason game.
Key Match Events: Tim Hill, Jake Cousins, and Luke Weaver combined for the final 14 outs as the Yankees defeated the Guardians, 5-2 in 10 innings, in Game 5 of the ALCS.
Juan Soto hit a tiebreaking three-run home run in the top of the 10th inning.
Tim Hill faced four batters and got two double plays to help the Yankees keep the score tied at 2-2.
Jake Cousins struck out four of the five batters he faced.
Luke Weaver pitched the final two innings to secure the win.
Post-Match Reflections: Tim Hill expressed pride in getting the job done and showing his value to the team.
Luke Weaver reflected on the significance of his role and the moment.
